oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The complexity of the classification problem of continua
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chang, Cheng
Gao, Su
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Logic
Mathematics - General Topology
Primary 03E15, 54F15, Secondary 54H05, 46E15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove that the homeomorphism problem for connected compact metric spaces is Borel bireducible with a universal orbit equivalence relation induced by a Borel action of a Polish group.
